thread.title: UPDATE: Huge convoy of mobile homes travels through Hampshire
thread.title_full: UPDATE: Huge convoy of mobile homes travels through Hampshire

title: UPDATE: Huge convoy of mobile homes travels through Hampshire
text:
Around 40 of the structures are being moved to Beaulieu Village, having set off from Rownhams Services at 9.45am. 
They are due to arrive around 11am. 
The mobile homes will go from Rownhams along the M27 west bound, onto the A326 down to the Heath Roundabout where it will take the Beaulieu Road to go via Hill Top and on to Beaulieu village. 
Police warn of delays between 9.45am and 11am. Share article 
About 50+ mobile homes ready to go after driver briefing at 0945. Expect delays Rownhans A326 hilltop beaulieu #inspS pic.twitter.com/HxK4f1AJ4f â€” Hants Roads Policing (@HantsPolRoads) September 17, 2015 
A rolling road block was used along the A326 to guide the mobile homes on their way. Promoted Stories UPDATE: Huge convoy of mobile homes travels through Hampshire   solentsu 9:54am Thu 17 Sep 15 
A classic example of something that should be moved overnight. A classic example of something that should be moved overnight. solentsu
